briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of BK1310 Intramuscular Injection in Healthy Infants
officialTitle: Phase 3 Study of BK1310 Intramuscular Injection in Healthy Infants
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of an intramuscular injection of BK1310 in healthy infants.

primaryOutcome.measure: Antibody Prevalence Rate Against Anti-PRP With 1 Î¼g/mL or Higher, Diphtheria Toxin, Pertussis, Tetanus Toxin, and Polio Virus, Defined as the Percentage of Participants With the Antibody Against Anti-PRP
